attributes.name: Breach Hunter's Fire Staff
attributes.description: "Find the breaches into this world and close them."
attributes.parsed_description: "Find the breaches into this world and close them."

attributes.name: Breaching Hatchet
attributes.description: "Into the breach I shall go. Waht awaits me on the other side, I do not know."
attributes.parsed_description: "Into the breach I shall go. Waht awaits me on the other side, I do not know."

attributes.name: Breachrunner's Musket
attributes.description: "It's much easier to take down a breach from far away."
attributes.parsed_description: "It's much easier to take down a breach from far away."

attributes.name: Breachshutter
attributes.description: "Defend our settlement, close that breach!"
attributes.parsed_description: "Defend our settlement, close that breach!"

attributes.name: Break Beyond
attributes.description: "We are only limited by what we choose to believe."
attributes.parsed_description: "We are only limited by what we choose to believe."

attributes.name: Breath of Sekhmet
attributes.description: "Like an inferno, when she opened her mouth to speak, the world burned with each word."
attributes.parsed_description: "Like an inferno, when she opened her mouth to speak, the world burned with each word."

attributes.name: Brevity
attributes.description: "From a distance, it sounds like a bough breaking in the winter snows."
attributes.parsed_description: "From a distance, it sounds like a bough breaking in the winter snows."

attributes.name: Briarmaw
attributes.description: "Those who trouble themselves to cut through briars often have the sense to take the long way back."
attributes.parsed_description: "Those who trouble themselves to cut through briars often have the sense to take the long way back."

attributes.name: Briarwood Staff
attributes.description: "Gnarled briars were grown to form a strong staff brimming with life."
attributes.parsed_description: "Gnarled briars were grown to form a strong staff brimming with life."

attributes.name: Brigand's Blade
attributes.description: "Respect your laws? I would never."
attributes.parsed_description: "Respect your laws? I would never."

attributes.name: Brigand's Musty Musket
attributes.description: "This musket clearly spent too much time stowed away on the ship, but it still fires all the same."
attributes.parsed_description: "This musket clearly spent too much time stowed away on the ship, but it still fires all the same."

attributes.name: Brightclaw
attributes.description: "The tip glistens beautifully when it catches the light."
attributes.parsed_description: "The tip glistens beautifully when it catches the light."

attributes.name: Brightwood Sharpshooter
attributes.description: A Musket, given as a gift for helping the townspeople of Brightwood.
attributes.parsed_description: A Musket, given as a gift for helping the townspeople of Brightwood.

attributes.name: Brilliant Refraction
attributes.description: "The blade bends the flow of combat as easily as it bends the light."
attributes.parsed_description: "The blade bends the flow of combat as easily as it bends the light."

attributes.name: Brinelash
attributes.description: “Salt crusts the blade, giving it a jagged edge. It's still not as salty as your opponent.”
attributes.parsed_description: “Salt crusts the blade, giving it a jagged edge. It's still not as salty as your opponent.”

attributes.name: Brine of the Frosty Shore
attributes.description: "A pleasant beach can turn into a rimey waste if the season turns too quickly."
attributes.parsed_description: "A pleasant beach can turn into a rimey waste if the season turns too quickly."

attributes.name: Brittle Bones
attributes.description: “A hatchet made from the bones of fallen enemies. Clearly these enemies were weak as bits and pieces of the hatchet break off with each swing.”
attributes.parsed_description: “A hatchet made from the bones of fallen enemies. Clearly these enemies were weak as bits and pieces of the hatchet break off with each swing.”

attributes.name: Brittle Fury
attributes.description: “Great for hacking at flesh, quite terrible at culling trees.”
attributes.parsed_description: “Great for hacking at flesh, quite terrible at culling trees.”

attributes.name: Brittle Longspear
attributes.description: "It seems as if it will break the second you strike something with it."
attributes.parsed_description: "It seems as if it will break the second you strike something with it."

attributes.name: Broadclaw
attributes.description: "With a broad swipe of his claws, all his enemies fell down, never to stand again."
attributes.parsed_description: "With a broad swipe of his claws, all his enemies fell down, never to stand again."

attributes.name: Broadside Sticker
attributes.description: "Hit their ship from the side! Thrust your spears into the wood of their ship, board it, and slay them all!"
attributes.parsed_description: "Hit their ship from the side! Thrust your spears into the wood of their ship, board it, and slay them all!"

attributes.name: Broken Glass
attributes.description: "Glass shatters into the skin of your enemy as your hammer crushes their bones."
attributes.parsed_description: "Glass shatters into the skin of your enemy as your hammer crushes their bones."

attributes.name: Broken Mast
attributes.description: "The ship crashed into the rocky shore of Aeternum shattering the hull and the mast. Survivors quickly scrambled to gather whatever weapon they could as they faced the Drowned on the shores."
attributes.parsed_description: "The ship crashed into the rocky shore of Aeternum shattering the hull and the mast. Survivors quickly scrambled to gather whatever weapon they could as they faced the Drowned on the shores."

attributes.name: Brutal Smasher
attributes.description: "Have you ever hit someone in the head with a warhammer? No? Well imagine a smashed pumpkin."
attributes.parsed_description: "Have you ever hit someone in the head with a warhammer? No? Well imagine a smashed pumpkin."

attributes.name: Buccaneer's Blunt Edge
attributes.description: "Anyone who says a sword is the most effective weapon has never tried to storm a keep."
attributes.parsed_description: "Anyone who says a sword is the most effective weapon has never tried to storm a keep."

attributes.name: Buccaneer's Bounty
attributes.description: "When the pirates sacked the great coastal cities, a buccaneer was particularly enticed by this axe. They brought it with them, and in their misfortune it washed ashore in Aeternum."
attributes.parsed_description: "When the pirates sacked the great coastal cities, a buccaneer was particularly enticed by this axe. They brought it with them, and in their misfortune it washed ashore in Aeternum."

attributes.name: Buccaneer's Bulwark
attributes.description: "Traditionally footsoldiers have used a shield. But to defend themselvs, the greatest pirates would wield only axes."
attributes.parsed_description: "Traditionally footsoldiers have used a shield. But to defend themselvs, the greatest pirates would wield only axes."

attributes.name: Buccaneer's Fire Staff
attributes.name_with_affixes: Buccaneer's Fire Staff of the Scholar
attributes.description: "Many a sailor has found their end at my hand."
attributes.parsed_description: "Many a sailor has found their end at my hand."

attributes.name: Buccaneer's Flatbow
attributes.description: "Many a sailor has found their end at my hand."
attributes.parsed_description: "Many a sailor has found their end at my hand."

attributes.name: Buccaneer's War Hammer

attributes.description: "Many a sailor has found their end at my hand."

attributes.name: Bulletstorm
attributes.description: "The speed at which this rifle fires is incredible."
attributes.parsed_description: "The speed at which this rifle fires is incredible."

attributes.name: Burial Spear
attributes.description: "It was once tradition to bury the dead with a weapon so that they could defend themselves in the afterlife. Of course, that tradition stopped once the dead would get right back up and begin fighting you with that weapon."
attributes.parsed_description: "It was once tradition to bury the dead with a weapon so that they could defend themselves in the afterlife. Of course, that tradition stopped once the dead would get right back up and begin fighting you with that weapon."

attributes.name: Burning Faestaff
attributes.description: "The staff is clearly crafted by the faefolk, with an enchanted flame adorning the edges."
attributes.parsed_description: "The staff is clearly crafted by the faefolk, with an enchanted flame adorning the edges."
